meta.label: Heavily shared datasets must be documented and in a data collection
meta.description: Ensures datasets shared across multiple projects are properly documented and shared to a data collection

params.name: max_nb_downstream_projects
params.label: Minimum number of projects to consider a dataset 'heavily-shared'
params.description: Datasets shared to this many projects or more will be checked

params.name: check_documentation
params.label: Check documentation completeness
params.description: Verify that heavily-shared datasets have proper documentation

params.name: check_if_dataset_contains_tag
params.label: Require dataset tags
params.description: Check if heavily-shared datasets have descriptive tags

params.name: check_if_dataset_contains_description
params.label: Require dataset description
params.description: Check if heavily-shared datasets have short and long descriptions

params.name: check_if_dataset_columns_contains_description
params.label: Require column descriptions
params.description: Check if all columns in heavily-shared datasets have descriptions
